price: Faraoni tha: “Nëse ke sjellë ndonjë shenjë, tregoje, nëse ajo që thua është e vërtetë”.
arabic: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔايَةٖ فَأۡتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qāla in kunta ji'ta biāyatin fati bihā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
